Boy van Duuren

Programming, automation, infrastructure.

So, short bio. I'm Boy van Duuren from The Hague in the Netherlands. Interested in programming, automation and IT-infrastructure, in no particular order.

Currently a bachelor student at the Open University which allows me to study next to my full-time job at RAAF Technology as a developer/{linux,infra}-consultant.

Want to know more? Check out my curriculum vitae (English or Dutch), or visit my Github or LinkedIn.
